de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.geometry

Class XYPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.geometry.XYPlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Result, Iterable<XYPlot.Curve>

    public class XYPlot
extends Object
implements Result, Iterable<XYPlot.Curve>
    An XYCurve is an ordered collection of 2d XYPlot.Curves, meant for chart generation.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
